version_description:
• Decreased tech research times
• Minor fixes and stability improvements

• Clan Towers - Build a towering beacon of superiority with your clan members. Race against other clans and earn gold!
• Clan Chat - Coordinate for total domination!
• Unlimited Prestiges - Earn more gold and climb the most prestigious leaderboard of them all!
• New Upgrades - Bricklaying and Industry!
• Bigger Leaderboards - View the top 10 clans on each board!
• More Rank Rewards - Earn more gold for ranking up!
• Raid Quitting Grace Period - One raid quit allowed per 48 hours without penalty!
• A new mystery feature to be unveiled soon...

• Tame wild wolves to create pet dogs!
• New wolf training skill tree!
• Assign wolfdogs to different roles for resource collection!
